name: Split Shot (Agent Amian)
description:
You control a ball that will be split into two smaller balls: black and white. Each ball can only bounce with blocks of the same color, but will shrink when bounced against walls. Your goal is to find the right spot where to split the ball to hit all the target blocks before both white and black balls disappear.

Simple controls.
Tap to shoot the big white ball. Then tap again to split it before reaching the top border.

Only 10 levels made. Not much time left for the jam and I'm terrible at level design for puzzle game. (something I learned during development lol)

Solving level 1~10 video.
